nodes.text: Clær was an astronomical object located in the Claer system, a part of the Sern sector in the Southern Core portion of the Colonies. It was the site of an exclusive preparatory academy. At some point between 5 BBY and 0 BBY, Imperial Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin sent his niece Rivoche to Clær in order to attend the academy.

Clær was created by Michael Allen Horne and first mentioned in Cracken's Rebel Operatives, a 1994 West End Games sourcebook for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Claer system, and therefore Clær, within grid square L-13.
